items.name: Sarah Chen
items.title: Looking for a working microwave in Quezon City
items.description: Hi everyone! My microwave just broke and I'm hoping someone has one they're not using. Willing to pick up anywhere in QC. Can trade for books or plants!

items.name: Miguel Santos
items.title: Free office chairs available - 5 pieces
items.description: Our office is downsizing and we have 5 office chairs to give away. They're in good condition, just minor wear. First come first serve!

items.name: Emma Rodriguez
items.title: How to turn old jeans into a tote bag
items.description: Just finished making a super cute tote bag from my old denim jeans! It's easier than you think. Anyone interested in a tutorial?

items.name: Carlo Reyes
items.title: Need help decluttering my garage
items.description: My garage has become a dumping ground and I don't know where to start. Any tips on how to organize and what to keep vs donate?

items.name: Lisa Tan
items.title: The impact of fast fashion on our environment
items.description: Did you know that the fashion industry is responsible for 10% of global carbon emissions? Let's discuss how we can make more sustainable choices.

items.name: David Kim
items.title: My journey to zero waste living
items.description: It's been 6 months since I started my zero waste journey. Here's what I learned and how it changed my life for the better.

items.name: Anna Garcia
items.title: Suggestion: Add a furniture category
items.description: Would it be possible to add a dedicated furniture category? I think it would make it easier for people to find what they need.

items.name: Ramon Cruz
items.title: Giving away children's books and toys
items.description: My kids have outgrown these books and toys. All in excellent condition. Perfect for ages 3-7. Available for pickup in Novaliches.

items.name: Jessica Wong
items.title: Wine bottle planters - step by step guide
items.description: Transform empty wine bottles into beautiful hanging planters! All you need is some rope, a cutting tool, and creativity. Here's how I did it.

items.name: Paolo Martinez
items.title: Minimalist bedroom transformation tips?
items.description: I want to transform my bedroom into a minimalist space. What should I keep and what should I let go? Need practical advice!

items.name: Sofia Lim
items.title: Composting 101: A beginner's guide
items.description: Starting a compost bin is easier than you think! Let me share my experience and tips for anyone who wants to reduce food waste.

items.name: Mark Fernandez
items.title: How I saved 10k pesos by fixing instead of buying
items.description: Instead of buying new appliances, I learned to fix them. Here's how it saved me money and helped reduce waste at the same time.

items.name: Rachel Aquino
items.title: Report: Spam posts in Item Requests section
items.description: I've noticed some spam posts with external links in the Item Requests section. Can the moderators take a look?

items.name: Ben Castillo
items.title: Looking for a laptop for online classes
items.description: My nephew needs a laptop for his online classes. Doesn't need to be fancy, just functional. Any kind soul willing to help?

items.name: Nina Velasco
items.title: Turn old t-shirts into cleaning rags
items.description: Stop buying paper towels! Old cotton t-shirts make the best reusable cleaning rags. Here's the simple method I use to cut and prepare them.

items.name: Gary Tan
items.title: Help! Too many sentimental items
items.description: I struggle to let go of things with sentimental value. How do you decide what to keep? Any tips for dealing with emotional attachment to objects?

items.name: Isabel Ramos
items.title: Plastic-free alternatives for daily use
items.description: I've been replacing plastic items in my home with sustainable alternatives. Here's my list of easy swaps that actually work!

items.name: Andre Lopez
items.title: From hoarder to minimalist in one year
items.description: A year ago, I couldn't walk through my apartment. Today, I live with less than 100 items. This is my transformation story.

items.name: Catherine Yu
items.title: Feature request: Rating system for users
items.description: Would be great to have a rating system so we can build trust in the community. What do others think about this idea?

items.name: Luis Mendoza
items.title: Free kitchen appliances - moving sale
items.description: Moving abroad and need to give away kitchen items: blender, rice cooker, toaster, pots and pans. Everything works perfectly!

items.name: Mia Santos
items.title: Cardboard box organizers for drawers
items.description: Before you recycle those Amazon boxes, try this! I made custom drawer organizers that fit perfectly and cost absolutely nothing.

items.name: Tony Perez
items.title: The one-year rule for decluttering
items.description: If you haven't used something in a year, do you really need it? Let's discuss this rule and whether it works for everyone.

items.name: Jasmine Lee
items.title: Why I stopped using single-use plastics
items.description: Single-use plastics are everywhere, but breaking free is possible. Here are the simple steps I took to eliminate them from my life.

items.name: Robert Chang
items.title: My family's journey to conscious consumption
items.description: Teaching kids about sustainability was challenging at first. Here's how we made it fun and turned it into a family mission.

items.name: Erica Gomez
items.title: Suggestion: Weekly donation drive meetups
items.description: What if we organized weekly meetups where people can bring items to donate or exchange? Would anyone be interested in this?

items.name: Vincent Diaz
items.title: Need a bike for my daily commute
items.description: Trying to reduce my carbon footprint by biking to work. Does anyone have a spare bicycle they're not using? Any condition is fine!

items.name: Olivia Tan
items.title: Mason jar storage solutions that changed my life
items.description: I've been saving glass jars for months and now my kitchen is perfectly organized! Here are 10 creative ways to use them.

items.name: Henry Cruz
items.title: Closet decluttering: where to start?
items.description: My closet is overflowing with clothes I never wear. What's the best method to decide what stays and what goes?

items.name: Grace Lim
items.title: The hidden cost of cheap fast furniture
items.description: That cheap IKEA desk might seem like a deal, but what's the environmental cost? Let's talk about sustainable furniture alternatives.

items.name: Daniel Rivera
items.title: How this community helped me start fresh
items.description: After a tough breakup, I had to rebuild my apartment from scratch. This community's generosity made it possible. Thank you all!

items.name: Samantha Wu
items.title: Report: Duplicate posts in multiple channels
items.description: Some users are posting the same content across multiple channels. Should we have a rule against this to keep things organized?

items.name: Kevin Reyes
items.title: Offering free gardening tools and pots
items.description: Downsizing my garden and have extra tools, pots, and soil. Perfect for anyone wanting to start their own garden. Free pickup in Fairview!

items.name: Lily Gonzales
items.title: Egg carton seed starters for your garden
items.description: Don't throw away those egg cartons! They make perfect biodegradable seed starters. Here's my simple method for starting your garden.

items.name: Chris Navarro
items.title: Digital decluttering - yes, it's a thing!
items.description: We talk about physical clutter, but what about digital? My phone had 10,000 photos! Here's how I tackled digital decluttering.

items.name: Amanda Flores
items.title: Water conservation tips for your home
items.description: Simple changes made me reduce water usage by 40%. Here are practical tips that don't require expensive equipment or major lifestyle changes.

items.name: Jason Villanueva
items.title: From consumer to conscious citizen
items.description: I used to shop every weekend out of boredom. Now I find joy in what I already have. Here's how I changed my relationship with stuff.

items.name: Melissa Torres
items.title: Suggestion: Add a success stories section
items.description: It would be inspiring to have a dedicated section for success stories about sustainability and decluttering. What do you all think?

items.name: Eric Morales
items.title: Looking for baby items for my newborn
items.description: First-time parent here! Looking for gently used baby clothes, bottles, and toys. Babies grow so fast, hoping someone can help us out!

items.name: Sophia Ramos
items.title: Furniture restoration with chalk paint
items.description: Transformed my old wooden dresser with chalk paint and new handles. It looks brand new! Here's a before and after plus tips.

items.name: Brian Castro
items.title: The KonMari method - does it really work?
items.description: Thinking about trying the KonMari method for decluttering. Has anyone here tried it? Would love to hear your experiences!

items.name: Victoria Chen
items.title: Local farmers markets vs supermarkets
items.description: Switching to local farmers markets reduced my plastic waste dramatically. Plus, fresher food and supporting local farmers. Win-win!

items.name: Nathan Santos
items.title: How I furnished my apartment for free
items.description: Moved to Manila with nothing. Thanks to this community, I now have a fully furnished apartment without spending a peso. Forever grateful!

items.name: Laura Mendez
items.title: Feature idea: Item reservation system
items.description: It would be helpful to have a way to reserve items so multiple people don't show up for the same thing. Thoughts?

items.name: Ryan Pascual
items.title: Giving away study table and chair
items.description: My son graduated and doesn't need these anymore. Study table with drawers and ergonomic chair. Great for students!

items.name: Jennifer Kim
items.title: Tin can planters with a vintage look
items.description: Save those tin cans! With some paint and creativity, they become beautiful vintage-style planters. Step-by-step guide included.

items.name: Matthew Cruz
items.title: Decluttering when you live with family
items.description: Anyone else struggling to declutter when family members keep bringing stuff home? How do you navigate this without causing conflict?

items.name: Ashley Lopez
items.title: The true cost of food waste
items.description: Did you know Filipinos waste about 9 million tons of food yearly? Let's discuss practical ways to reduce food waste at home.

items.name: Brandon Reyes
items.title: Minimalism helped my mental health
items.description: Less stuff = less stress. Here's how decluttering and minimalism improved my anxiety and overall mental wellbeing.

items.name: Christine Tan
items.title: Report: Inappropriate language in comments
items.description: I've noticed some comments with inappropriate language. Can we strengthen our community guidelines?

items.name: Justin Garcia
items.title: Need art supplies for community workshop
items.description: Organizing a free art workshop for kids in our barangay. Anyone have spare art supplies like paints, brushes, or paper?

items.name: Diana Velasco
items.title: Pallet wood furniture projects
items.description: Made a coffee table from recycled pallets! It's sturdy, looks amazing, and cost next to nothing. Here's how you can do it too.

items.name: Peter Jimenez
items.title: Sentimental clutter - how to let go
items.description: My late grandmother's belongings are taking up my entire storage room. How do I honor her memory while still letting go?

items.name: Michelle Santos
items.title: Eco-friendly cleaning products you can make
items.description: Stop buying expensive toxic cleaners! Vinegar, baking soda, and lemon can clean almost everything. Here are my favorite recipes.

items.name: Kevin Alvarez
items.title: Paid off debt by selling unused items
items.description: Decluttered my home and sold items I never used. Made enough to pay off my credit card debt! Here's my strategy.

items.name: Stephanie Lim
items.title: Suggestion: Mobile app for easier browsing
items.description: A mobile app would make it so much easier to check listings on the go. Is this something the team is considering?

items.name: Gregory Torres
items.title: Free textbooks for college students
items.description: Graduated and have a bunch of college textbooks in good condition. Free for any student who needs them. Various subjects available!

items.name: Rebecca Diaz
items.title: Old ladder shelf transformation
items.description: Turned an old wooden ladder into a beautiful bookshelf! Super easy project that adds character to any room. Tutorial in comments.

items.name: Andrew Rosales
items.title: Paper clutter management system
items.description: Bills, receipts, documents everywhere! I finally created a system that works. Here's my approach to conquering paper clutter.

items.name: Nicole Fernandez
items.title: Community gardens and urban farming
items.description: Started a small urban farm on my roof. Growing vegetables reduces grocery bills and carbon footprint. Anyone else doing this?

items.name: Joshua Martinez
items.title: This community saved me during the pandemic
items.description: Lost my job during lockdown. Kind strangers from this group helped me with groceries and essentials. I'm employed again and giving back now!
